title: Understanding Suicide Precautions
text: When planning care for a suicidal client, it's crucial to ensure their environment is safe. Think about what items might pose a risk and how you can help the client express their feelings.

title: Identifying Risky Items
text: What items should be removed from the environment to ensure safety?

hintAnswer: Develop a therapeutic relationship that encourages the client to express their feelings and thoughts openly
title: Building a Therapeutic Relationship
text: How can you encourage a client to express their feelings and thoughts?
choices: Develop a therapeutic relationship that encourages the client to express their feelings and thoughts openly
Provide them with a journal to write their thoughts
Encourage them to talk to family members
